channel.title: Career on Somewhere in the middle
channel.description: Recent content in Career on Somewhere in the middle

item.title: Obliterate the Wave
item.description: Working at my previous company had been an incredible journey spanning nearly five years. I wasn’t a direct hire but had the privilege of being part of the team through an agency. The company, known for its nurturing work environment, had all the elements conducive to personal and professional growth. The workload was balanced, my co-workers were not just colleagues but friends, and the salary, particularly in a developing country like mine, was more than satisfactory.
